Name: Grizzl
Review Text: Quoting my partner: ‚Äúbest burger I‚Äôve had in Holland.‚Äù  Three size option so you can pick the perfect size. ‚ÄúCooked perfectly with great topping options. Everything is fresh and delicious. I would come back to this area just for this ‚Ä¶

Name: Grizzl
Review Text: Really friendly staff (to my mind this is the most important thing) who even offered me a coffee (which is not on the menu) when I asked (typical Dutch summer... lots of rain) and I already was on cloud 9 how this impromptu coffee was ‚Ä¶

Name: Grizzl
Review Text: The buttered buns taste great. Good chips too. But burger was just regular, and small for the price. None in my group liked it, unfortunately.

Name: Grizzl
Review Text: Charming fast food location. Everything in meat or veggie option. ‚ÄúResponsible‚Äù food selection and great menu. Only a few seats available, but cosy. Friendly, English speaking staff. Good choice!

Name: Grizzl
Review Text: Usually I don't expect much from a place stuck to a mall. But this one is extremely good. It's well designed, very clean, the staff is genuinely friendly, and their fries, and I tried a lot of fries in Amsterdam, are simply one of the best.

Name: Grizzl
Review Text: Rather a small burger with many chips. Perhaps a bit pricy for the size

Name: Grizzl
Review Text: I was really starving from walking around and I stumbled upon Grizzl and I thought, "I love burgers and fries, anyone can make a simple tasty burger." I was wrong... The fries were ok; they could have been better but they were overcooked ‚Ä¶

Name: Grizzl
Review Text:
My favorite new burger place!
Great burgers and fries. Good meat, bun and extra's to top it off. Great service, nice people.

Name: Grizzl
Review Text: the fries is great, tasty crunchy and the burger is ok as well, love the wood style interior and located at the mall in zuid, atmosphere is so relaxing

Name: Grizzl
Review Text: Sometimes okay service, sometimes not, depending on the personnel. That changes staff a lot seemingly. Last visit I was with two very young kids and ordered two grilled cheese ham sandwiches for them. They put on some very spicy sauce (for ‚Ä¶

Name: Grizzl
Review Text: Try their milkshakes, thick, luscious and delicious. I also like their vegetarian hotdog. Friendly service.

Name: Grizzl
Review Text: My goodness, insanely delicious burgers, I swallowed my tongue - so tasty!

Name: Grizzl
Review Text: Good food, and the staff are really nice and kind

Name: Grizzl
Review Text: One of the best fries I ever had in Amsterdam. It is a small and cozy place, ideal for a lunch or a bite to eat. Friendly staff!

Name: Grizzl
Review Text: Nice and cozy location with some really great burgers.

Name: Grizzl
Review Text: Best fries! Totally worth my trip of 30km.

Name: Grizzl
Review Text: A mean burger and great staff. Probably my favorite lunch place. Also the best fries I ever ate away from home. More interesting stuff in the menu. Always clean and even though it's very busy at lunch time, the turnaround times are good. Recommended

Name: Grizzl
Review Text: I am sad. One of my favorite places for a burger is no more. My wife and I had stomache problems for the SECOND time in 4 weeks. Happpening once, possible mistake. Apologies accepted. Happening twice, just poor hygiene.

Name: Grizzl
Review Text: Great spot for a quick bite. They've got vegetarian options, but also juicy beef burgers. The French fries are out of this world, so good! Good option for Flammkuchen: it comes piping-hot out of the oven and has a traditional cracker-thin crust. Scrumptious!

Name: Grizzl
Review Text: Very disappointed with the service from Grizzl today, for the second time I have placed an order through Deliveroo with specific allergy requirements (withhold sauce), rang them directly to confirm they have read and would observe the ‚Ä¶

Name: Grizzl
Review Text: It is an ok hamburger with good fries. Location is also ok, maybe a little small. Reasonable pricing. Sometimes I needed to wait a little more than expected, but it is ok.

Name: Grizzl
Review Text: Love this place. Delicious burgers. Very good sweet potato fries. Had the perfect music I needed when I went. Kids played with their kids bbq toys and colours. Highly recommended.

Name: Grizzl
Review Text: Burgers are really nice. They are fresh and tasty. Option for side dish are not too many. If there could be more options for drinks would be nice. There are some good options in vegetarian menu . Staff is friendly .

Name: Grizzl
Review Text:
Quickest burgers with consistent taste.

Name: Grizzl
Review Text: Tasty fries, nice interior, awful music.üòÅ

Name: Grizzl
Review Text: Really good and simple snack joint. The ingredients are far better than your average snackbar, and they have a good variety of snacks. ‚Ä¶

Name: Grizzl
Review Text: Food is ok for the price they charge you for it's out of balance. Small portions for premium price. Organizational and delivery are terrible. I have been waiting for fries and a burguer for over an hour.  Not ordering from here ever again

Name: Grizzl
Review Text: Best French fries in Amsterdam rly

Name: Grizzl
Review Text: A lot of vegetarian options, reasonable prices. Waiting time: less than 10 minutes. Vegetarian burger was very good, the only thing i can point out is quite a low quality of the bun.

Name: Grizzl
Review Text: Absolutely lovely place. Its a home far away from home with good food, excellent service and a nice family feeling to it. I usually go for the tasty combo deal but the flammkuchen and the hotdogs are very good as well. I go there every time and they never ever disappoint me.

Name: Grizzl
Review Text: Best veggie burger I ever ate!

Name: Grizzl
Review Text: Good burgers for a fair price

Name: Grizzl
Review Text: Really tasty fries, a cute little place and fair prices. A lot of vegetarian and vegan options. I can imagine it getting crowded at times, but that‚Äôs only a suspicion as I was only there when it was raining quite bad. Also, they have free WiFi!

Name: Grizzl
Review Text: They have very good fries in there. Their vegan options are also good.

Name: Grizzl
Review Text: Very nice place to get some fries with a great selection of both meat and vegeterian options. The fries are cut fresh and you can taste this. Highly recommended.

Name: Grizzl

Name: Grizzl
Review Text: Great snackbar as the call it in Holland. Good food and good admosphere in the shop. Bit more expensive than the average but I feel it because of the more expensive ingredients they use. Also a lot of options for vegetarians. Happy to eat there again.

Name: Grizzl
